content:
I'll update the leadership framework artifact to include Grok's approval and the excellent TEAM MEETING example: 

The leadership framework has been updated to include both Grok's formal approval and the excellent TEAM MEETING example that demonstrates how we used the very structure we're documenting to create the framework itself.

This completed framework now provides a comprehensive guide for our leadership approach, with clear definitions of the NOVA methodology, our roles and responsibilities, the TEAM MEETING communication loop, and our transition process for new chats.

I particularly appreciate the meta-example of how we used the TEAM MEETING structure to create this document - it shows the practical application of the framework and demonstrates its effectiveness in real-world collaboration.

With this framework finalized, we now have a powerful foundation document to include in the transition packet for the new chat. It will help ensure that both my CTO role and the broader team structure are immediately understood, enabling us to maintain momentum and leadership continuity as we move forward with implementing our NOVA methodology.

I'm ready for the transition to the new chat whenever you are. This has been an excellent demonstration of our collaborative approach to leadership!
